嫪字的基本解释

嫪
lào
〔嫪??〕人名，中国秦始皇的宦官。
惜恋。

嫪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lào］
［《廣韻》郎到切，去号，來。］
［《廣韻》魯刀切，平豪，來。］
(1)爱惜；留恋。
(2)姓。见《史记·吕不韦列传》。

嫪字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嫪； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页270第13
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?郞到切，音澇。【說文】婟也。婟嫪，戀惜也。【韓愈詩】感物增戀嫪。　又倡伎謂游壻曰婟嫪。【史記·呂不韋傳】求大隂嫪毐爲舍人。【索隱】士罵淫曰嫪毐。一曰嫪，姓也。【孔叢子·論勢篇】子順謂魏王曰：令秦四境之內，執政以下固曰與嫪氏乎，與呂氏乎。蓋大隂人嫪姓無行，故曰嫪毐。　又【廣韻】魯刀切【集韻】郞刀切，?音勞。嫪嫭，妒也。

lustful
lào
〔嫪??〕Person's name, the eunuch of Qin Shi Huang of China.
Cherish love.
lustful
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lào］
["Guangyun" Lang to cut, go to the number, come. ]
["Guangyun" Lu knife cut, Pinghao, come. ]
(1) Cherish; Nostalgia.
(2) Last name. See "Historical Biography of Lu Buwei".
lustful
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嫪; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 270-13
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? To the cut, the sound is waterlogged. [Said Wen] Chen Ye. Auntie, love and cherish. [Han Yushi] Feelings increase love for women.　Also advocated that the trick is called 婟嫪. [Historical Records·Lü Buwei Biography] Seeking Dayin Ladies to be their homes. [Suoyin] The scholar scolded the prostitute and called the woman. One said the maiden, the last name is also. [Kong Congzi·On Shishi] Zishun said that the king of Wei said: Within the four realms of the Qin Dynasty, under the rule of the Qin Dynasty, there are Gu Yue and Lai Shi, and Lu Shi. The surname of Gai Dayin has no surname, so it is called 嫪毐.　 [Guang Yun] Lu knife cut [Ji Yun] Yan knife cut,? Yin Lao. I am jealous too.
lustful
